00037   void registerCalibrationKit(const std::string &kit_name, CalibrationKit *a_kit) {
00038     if (a_kit) {
00039       _kits.insert(std::make_pair(kit_name,a_kit));
00040     }

00045   Calibration *createCalibrationObject(const std::string &name, const std::string &module_type_col_name,  const std::string &module_calibration_col_name) 
00046     throw(std::runtime_error)
00047   {
00048     std::map<std::string, CalibrationKit *>::const_iterator kit_iter=_kits.find(name);
00049     if (kit_iter==_kits.end()) {
00050       std::stringstream message;
00051       message << "CalibrationFactory::getCalibrationObject> No calibration object of name" << name << ".";
00052       throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00053     }
00054     return kit_iter->second->create(module_type_col_name,module_calibration_col_name);
00055   };
00056
